TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IOutputChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
type IOutputChannel = interface interface IChannel interface ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 定義通道必須要實作才能傳送訊息的介面。

span.span: Defines the interface that a channel must implement to send a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面會定義 作業的同步和非同步 Variant。The interface defines synchronous and asynchronous variants of the operation. 它會針對通道上送出之訊息的目的端提供 。It provides a for the destination of the messages sent out on the channel.

summary.span: 開始傳送訊息的非同步作業。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to send a message.

The delegate.

summary.span: 開始非同步作業，將訊息傳送到輸出通道的目的端。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to transmit a message to the destination of the output channel.

returns.span: 參考非同步訊息傳輸的 。

span.span: The that references the asynchronous message transmission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在輸出通道上送出之訊息的目的端會在通道建立時指定。The destination for messages sent out on an output channel is specified at channel creation time. 方法不保證會將訊息傳送到遠端端點。The method does not guarantee the delivery of message to the remote endpoint. 如果需要傳遞保證，請使用 。If delivery guarantees are required, use the . 如果傳送的訊息大於所使用之繫結允許的訊息大小上限，則會擲回 。If the message sent is larger that the maximum message size allowed by the binding being used, a is thrown. 訊息大小上限是由 屬性所設定。The maximum message size is set by the property. 預設值為 65536 個位元組。The default value is 65536 bytes. ## Examples 下列程式碼說明如何實作這個方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#2)]

summary.span: 取得輸出通道上訊息傳送之目的服務的目的端。

span.span: Gets the destination of the service to which messages are sent out on the output channel.

value.span: 輸出通道傳送訊息之目的服務的 。

span.span: The of the service to which the output channel sends messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有指定 ， 會同時當做最終目的端和實體位址。The serves as both the ultimate destination and the physical address if a is not specified. 如果指定了 ，這就是訊息傳送的實際實體目標位址，而且訊息必須透過這個位址，才能到達目的端。If the is specified, then that is the actual physical address to which the message is sent and through which the message must go to arrive at its destination. ## Examples 下列程式碼說明如何實作這個屬性：The following code illustrates how to implement this property: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#0)]

summary.span: 在目前的輸出通道上傳送訊息。

span.span: Sends a message on the current output channel.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Send (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Send(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message) cil managed

param.name: message
param.span: 正在輸出通道上傳送的 。

span.span: The being sent on the output channel.

summary.span: 將訊息傳送到輸出通道的目的端。

span.span: Transmits a message to the destination of the output channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在輸出通道上送出之訊息的目的端會在通道建立時指定。The destination for messages sent out on an output channel is specified at channel creation time. 方法不保證會將訊息傳送到遠端端點。The method does not guarantee the delivery of message to the remote endpoint. 的實作 (Implementation) 能夠以無訊息模式針對各種原因卸除訊息。An implementation of can silently drop messages for a variety of reasons. 例如，可能沒有其他緩衝區空間。There may be no more buffer room, for example. 如果需要傳遞保證，請使用 。If delivery guarantees are required, use . 將訊息傳遞給輸出通道會造成該訊息的取用。Passing the message into the output channel causes the message to be consumed. 當您呼叫 之後，便無法再檢查此訊息，或針對此訊息呼叫 。After you call , you can no longer inspect the message or call on the message. ## Examples 下列程式碼說明如何實作這個方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#5)]

summary.span: 於指定的時間間隔內在目前的輸出通道上傳送訊息。

span.span: Sends a message on the current output channel within a specified interval of time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在輸出通道上送出之訊息的目的端會在通道建立時指定。The destination for messages sent out on an output channel is specified at channel creation time. 方法不保證會將訊息傳送到遠端端點。The method does not guarantee the delivery of message to the remote endpoint. 的實作 (Implementation) 能夠以無訊息模式針對各種原因卸除訊息。An implementation of can silently drop messages for a variety of reasons. 例如，可能沒有其他緩衝區空間。There may be no more buffer room, for example. 如果需要傳遞保證，請使用 。If delivery guarantees are required, use . 將訊息傳遞給輸出通道會造成該訊息的取用。Passing the message into the output channel causes the message to be consumed. 當您呼叫 之後，便無法再檢查此訊息，或針對此訊息呼叫 。After you call , you can no longer inspect the message or call on the message. ## Examples 下列程式碼說明如何實作這個方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#6)]

The operation should throw a if the specified is exceeded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有指定 ， 會同時當做最終目的端和實體位址。The serves as both the ultimate destination and the physical address if a is not specified. 如果指定了 ，這就是訊息傳送的實際實體目標位址，而且訊息必須透過這個位址，才能到達目的端。If the is specified, then that is the actual physical address to which the message is sent and through which the message must go to arrive at its destination. ## Examples 下列程式碼說明如何實作這個屬性：The following code illustrates how to implement this property: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#1)]
